name: URUBU
description:
URUBU is a Online Co-Op, payload & Gestion Elements.

You play as recruits from the lastest division in their final test to join the ranks of Urubu.

The Game was made in 10 weeks in the context of Ubisoft Game Lab Competition.

To summarize the game, you need to destroy your environment to fuel your train, and bring it to the end of the level as soon as possible!
